properties.description:
Rules:

  • capitalize first word
  • keep initial article
  • capitalize proper nouns
  • for Senior Reports, please leave "Final Report", "Senior Report", or "Senior Design Project" out of title
properties.title: Title

properties.description:
Rules:

  • subtitles are a wholly optional field for senior reports
  • do not capitalize first word
  • capitalize proper nouns
properties.title: Sub Title

properties.description:
Rules:

  • record what the document says regarding the author, after the titles, verbatim
  • flows from the title/subtitle, with the same capitalization rules
  • no substitutions or paraphrasing

Example:

by John Doe or written by John Doe...
properties.title: Statement of Responsibility

properties.default_value: Not available for use outside of the University of New Brunswick
properties.description: Copyright information related to the publication; could be related to who owns the copyright to the abstract, etc.
properties.title: Copyright Information

properties.description: Note: if institutional name is not available from the dropdown, please contact the repository manager.
properties.title: Institution

properties.description:
Rules:

  • write department name verbatim as appears on document unless that department is an older departmental name... always use the current departmental name
  • no need for campus distinction
  • if it there is no department name, write faculty name

Example:

Department of Chemical Engineering
properties.title: Department

properties.description:
Rules:

  • year only
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description:
Rules:

  • if there is an attached, scanned, or electronic PDF file, you should record electronic
  • if you don't have an attached, scanned, or electronic PDF file, you are likely entering a record for something in print
properties.title: Form

properties.description:
Rules:

  • roman numeral/front matter pages should be counted separately from regular numbered pages
  • put last roman numeral page first, a comma, and the last numbered page in the document

Example:

ix, 137 pages
properties.title: Extent

properties.description:
Rules:

  • if a document is electronic only, please insert "Electronic Only" as a note.
    • Example: Electronic Only.
  • if current faculty name differs from the faculty name on the object, note the original faculty name here
    • Example: Original Faculty Name: Faculty of Foresty
  • if old call number information is present, you may leave it
  • note if images or other supplementary files are attached to the document
properties.title: Note

properties.description:
Rules:

  • if the file has a call number, it goes here
  • if the file is only electronic, input the following: electronic only
properties.title: Location

properties.description: Note: Subject fields are Library of Congress Subject Headings. Unless specifically instructed, it is safe to skip these.
Note: can skip.
properties.title: ISBN

properties.description: Note: unless otherwise instructed, can skip.
properties.title: Classification (lcc)

properties.description: Note: unless otherwise instructed, can skip.
properties.title: Classification (ddc)

properties.description: Information specifically related to the degree this document was created as a requirement for.
properties.title: Degree

properties.description:
Rules:

  • name of the degree in full

Example:

Bachelor of Science in Engineering
properties.title: Name

properties.description:
Rules:

  • name of the field as specified by the department the document was submitted to

Example:

Mechanical Engineering
properties.title: Discipline

properties.description: Facet information is metadata used specifically by UNB Scholar to improve searching and collections building. Metadata in these fields may be used to narrow-down search results or help designate specific items to unique collections.
properties.title: Facet Information

properties.description: Verbatim name of faculty, regardless of campus.
properties.title: Faculty Name

properties.description: Verbatim name of department, regardless of campus.
properties.title: Department Name

properties.description: Group name is specific to research institutes or other unique collections groupings (ie: Second Language Research Institute or Canadian Rivers Institute. Skip unless you are certain this document was a product of that group.
properties.title: Group Name

properties.description: Should match the Discipline entry under the Degree field above.
properties.title: Discipline Name
